tweets.author: Beth Smith
tweets.tweet: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call love is just a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, Morty, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. I did it. Your parents are gonna do it. Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science

tweets.author: Rick Sanchez
tweets.tweet: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We’re all going to die. Come watch TV.

tweets.author: Morty Smith
tweets.tweet: Yeah, I’d like to order one large phone with extra phones, please.” “Cell phone. No-no-no-no, rotary! And pay phone on half.

tweets.author: Big Boobed Waitress
tweets.tweet: It's like the N word and the C word had a baby and it was raised by all the bad words for Jews.

tweets.author: Blim Blam
tweets.tweet: You're young, you have your whole life ahead of you, and your anal cavity is still taut yet malleable.

tweets.author: Benjamin
tweets.tweet: I mean, why would a Pop-Tart want to live inside a toaster, Rick? I mean, that would be like the scariest place for them to live. You know what I mean?

tweets.author: Armagheadon
tweets.tweet: You're missing the point Morty. Why would he drive a smaller toaster with wheels? I mean, does your car look like a smaller version of your house?
